name: Ace Bird 64
description:
RACE THE CLOCK! DROP THE BOMB

Ace Bird 64 Is a game made for GMTK 2020 by Roy Tettero and Frank Meier.
All code and assets were made during the jam.

Free music graciously provided by nosoapradio.us

Controls

Use the left/right arrow (or A and D) keys to move the plane.
